item.description:
We love Halloween. Do you?

It's a fun, fun time to dare & transform into your “other” self,
letting your imagination run wild & free.

To attract the life you desire, are you able to see yourself transformed as already there?

You can “trick” it by faking it til you make it.
or
You can “treat” yourself by seeing, feeling, & having that desired life.

Say BOO to self doubt. Join us for a fun experiential evening to step outside of your current reality and step into the reality you wish to be true.

When our actions reflect our beliefs,
what we’ve decided then becomes our reality

***************************************************
RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming.

We provide appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your support!

***************************************************

For parking & directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft :

(1) Go here: http://www.meetup.com/lawofattraction-us/files/

(2) Log in

(3) Scroll down and click "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"
item.how_to_find_us: Boo to Self Doubt. Trick or Treat to Attract the Life You Desire

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group
